title: 01_ Form Validator
description: Simple client side form validation. Check required, length, email and password match

title: 02_ Movie Seat Booking
description: Display movie choices and seats in a theater to select from in order to purchase tickets

title: 03_ Custom Video Player
description: Custom video player using the HTML5 video element and it's JavaScript API with a custom design

title: 04_ Exchange Rate Calculator
description: Select countries to get the exchange rate for a specific amount

title: 05_ DOM Array Methods
description: Project to teach high order array methods and DOM manipulation

title: 06_ Modal & Menu Slider
description: Simple landing page with sliding menu and modal

title: 07_ Hangman
description: Select a letter to figure out a hidden word in a set amount of chances

title: 08_ Meal Finder App
description: Search and generate random meals from the (https://themealdb.com) API

title: 09_ Expense Tracker
description: Keep track of income and expenses. Add and remove items and save to local storage

title: 10_ MusicPlayer
description: Create beautiful UI to play music stored in the music folder using the HTML5 audio API

title: 11_ Infinite Scroll Blog
description: Display blog posts from [jsonplaceholder](https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/) and add infinite scroll to fetch posts and also add filter box

title: 12_ Typing Game
description: Game to beat the clock by typing random words

title: 13_ Speech Text Reader
description: A text to speech app for non-verbal people. Pre-made buttons and custom text speech. This project uses the Web Speech API

title: 14_ Memory Cards
description: Flash card app for learning. Display, add and remove memory cards with questions and answers

title: 15_ Lyrics Search App
description: Find songs, artists and lyrics using the lyrics.ovh API

title: 16_ Relaxer App
description: A relaxing breathing app with a visual director to tell you when to breathe in, hold and breathe out

title: 17_ Breakout!
description: Game where you control a paddle with the arrow keys to bounce a ball up to break bricks. This app uses the HTML5 canvas element and API
